channel.title: dividends on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in dividends on FinanClub

item.title: PR
item.description: score:86 Chances: Permian Resources announced its second quarter 2023 financial and operational results. The company’s Board declared a quarterly base cash dividend and a quarterly variable cash dividend, enhancing shareholder value. Permian Resources will report its financial and operating results for the second quarter, providing insights into its performance.

item.title: ENB
item.description: score:71 Chances: Enbridge has a history of paying dividends and steady growth. Enbridge generated positive distributable cash flow in the second quarter. Enbridge’s natural gas distribution business serves millions of customers. Enbridge reported higher profit in the second quarter due to increased oil volumes.
